markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Liberating Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=2354)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 258

**Tradition**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Nameless](/Deities.aspx?ID=598), [Ranginori](/Deities.aspx?ID=693), [Ristrentho](/Deities.aspx?ID=608), [Scal](/Deities.aspx?ID=410), [Shei](/Deities.aspx?ID=653), [Ssila’meshnik](/Deities.aspx?ID=548)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You call out a liberating cry, urging an ally to break free of an effect that holds them in place. If the target is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77), [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=81), or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90), it can immediately use a reaction to attempt to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=2296).
name: Liberating Command

summary: You call out a liberating cry, urging an ally to break free of an effect that holds them in place.
summary_markdown: You call out a liberating cry, urging an ally to break free of an effect that holds them in place.
text: Liberating Command Single Action Source Divine Mysteries pg. 258 Tradition Occult Deities Nameless, Ranginori, Ristrentho, Scal, Shei, Ssila’meshnik Range 60 feet Target 1 creature --- You call out a liberating cry, urging an ally to break free of an effect that holds them in place. If the target is grabbed, immobilized, or restrained, it can immediately use a reaction to attempt to Escape.
